instructions: Always use the Dockerfile environment for all Android development tasks
Follow the pull request template when creating PRs
Test Android apps using the available emulator and testing tools
Ensure all Android builds are tested in the Docker environment
Use the Android SDK and tools available in the container
Run 'avdmanager list avd' to check available Android Virtual Devices
Use 'gradlew build' for Android native builds
Use 'npm run android' for React Native builds
Always check if the app builds successfully before creating a PR
Include relevant testing information in the PR description
